From K-vitamins , menaquinone-7 ( MK-7 ) identify effective cofactor carboxylation reaction Gla-proteins osteocalcin matrix-gla protein . The primary objective double-blind randomize intervention study establish optimal dose MK-7 carboxylation vitamin K-dependent protein osteocalcin bone matrix-gla protein vessel wall . The optimal dose concentration osteocalcin matrix-gla protein > 90 % active ( =carboxylated ) form .
